your_invite_code: Please Key In Your Invite Code
register_password_condition: Minimum of 8 characters, with upper and lowercase and a number, or a symbol.
verify_email_sent: A verification email has been sent to you.
follow_link: Please follow the link in the email to complete the registration process.
resend_in_time: You will be able to resend in
increase_the_reach: <text>You can <highlight>increase the reach</highlight> of your Asks by increasing the size of your Trust Network</text>
go_ahead: <text>So go ahead and invite up to <highlight>{{number}}</highlight> friends!</text>
inviting_more_friends: by inviting more friends to join your Trust Network
sharing_your_network: Create an Ask now and start sharing with your network
air_feed_tips: <normal>Grow your community by helping them make the right connections at the <bold>Air Feed</bold>
ask_tips: <normal>Looking for a referral? You can create an </normal><bold>Ask</bold> <normal>here in less than 2mins</normal>
trust_network_tips: <normal>Expand your</normal><bold> Trust Network</bold><normal> by inviting your friends</normal>
chat_tips: <normal>Take your Asks to the next level by answering to responses in the <bold>Chat</bold> <normal>tab</normal>
ask_suggest_1:
Hi there! This is where you can start to create an Ask and send it to your network. 

 You can long press on me to access the tutorial and speech-to-text Ask creation.
ask_suggest_4: Pick a suggestion or type what you are looking for.
ask_suggest_5: Still can't find that you want? Type it in!
ask_suggest_6: Looking good! Ready to go to Next step?
ask_suggest_7: Tell others why you are looking for this.
time_left: <normal>Time left to edit this Ask: <highlight>{{mins}} mins</highlight>
name: Name
forgot_password_description: We all do! Just fill in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
check_your_mail_description: We sent a reset password instruction to your mailbox.
message_individual: Send separate, private messages to one or both users.
feed_message: <normal>Tell <blueHighlight>{{name1}}</blueHighlight> why you think <greenHighlight>{{name2}}</greenHighlight> would make a good connection</normal>
ask_warning:
Are you sure you want to exit this 
Ask creation and lose all your 
progress?
trust_network_warning:
<normal>This action only removes this person 
from Trust Network on your end. 
Are you sure you want to remove </normal><bold>{{name}}</bold>
accepted_invite: You have accepted an invite to join the Trust Network of
sending_kudos:
You will be sending kudos to 
Vicky's introducers too
